name: Adventure Map Glacier National Park - Rogers Pass Summer Map
categories: Glacier National Park - Rogers Pass Summer Ma
description: A 1:50,000-scale map with more than 150km of hiking, skiing, and interpretive trails for the Rogers Pass and Glacier National Park area. Chart out your route to the Tupper, Avalanche, Illecillewaet, Asulkan, and Bonney glaciers, or the Hermit, Sir Donald, and Asulkan ranges.
